title: The chances of a second-half recovery are now zero (Ep. 722)
itunes:title: The chances of a second-half recovery are now zero
description: The consensus has called for an economic recovery by the second half of the year. But the chances of that happening are… Zero. Remember: There’s a big difference between the stock market and the economy. [0:30] Then Scot Cohen, executive chairman of Wrap Technologies and a money manager for over 20 years, returns to the podcast. If you’re a new listener, this is one of the most incredible small-cap companies I’ve ever covered. [22:47] Anyone who invested in COVID-19 biotech stocks has a reason to be worried… Here’s why you should be looking to take profits following massive moves higher in the biotech space right now. [54:47] -------------------------------- Enjoyed this episode?
